summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6013 for the improvement of Trenton Street from 47th Avenue South to 48th Avenue South, on the north, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81104, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
